name: Sausage and Peppers for a Dozen
author: Anonymous
summary: Oven-roasted Italian sausage, green peppers, and onions are mixed with perfectly-seasoned Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce and are piled into Pepperidge Farm® Classic Sandwich Buns and topped with Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 3 pounds sweet Italian pork sausages, cut into 2-inch pieces
3 medium green peppers, cut into 2-inch long strips
1 (4 pound 4 ounce) jar Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce
12 each Pepperidge Farm® Classic Sandwich Buns with Sesame Seeds, split
directions: Put the sausage in a 16 1/2 x 12 x 2 1/2-inch disposable foil pan
Bake at 425 degrees F for 45 minutes or until the sausage is browned
Carefully pour off juices that are in the pan
Stir in the pasta sauce, peppers and onions
Bake for 45 minutes more or until the sausage reaches an internal temperature of 160 degrees F
Divide the sausage and peppers among the roll halves
Top with the cheese and remaining roll halves
